snippet: Fighting between cattle herders and farmers over land and water killed 12 people on Friday in a southeastern region, the Kenya Red Cross said.
abstract: Fighting breaks out between cattle herders and farmers in Kenya over land and water, leaving 12 people dead.
lead_paragraph: Fighting between cattle herders and farmers over land and water killed 12 people on Friday in a southeastern region, the Kenya Red Cross said.

headline.main: Kenya: Clashes Over Land and Water Leave 12 Dead
headline.print_headline: Kenya: Clashes Over Land and Water Leave 12 Dead
